name: Worker Simulator
description:
🗺️​ Step into the world of Worker Simulator! Assume the role of Jack, a diligent individual embarking on a new life in land No. 6. 📍​ This open-world video game grants you the liberty to navigate the terrain, engage in diverse factory work, and participate in player-to-NPC trading. As Jack, seize the chance to amass wealth through your labor, allowing you to buy or rent your ideal in-game home. Witness the growth of animals you raise, observing them transition from youthful and playful beings to mature adults. Welcome to a realm of endless possibilities and hard work! 🏃🏻​
➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​
🎮​ Gameplay Features
1- Cleaning the land ​🧑‍🔧​
2- Animal Husbandry 🐏​🐐​
3- Collect items from the city 🧊​🍶​
4- Driving vehicles 🚖​🚗​
5- Farming plants 🌶️​🍉​🍎​🍓​
6- Building houses and barns 👷🏻​🛖​🏚️​
7- Sell Items 🛒​
8- Player State 🍹​🍗​❤️​
9- Fast Travel 🎑​
10- Bank System 💰​
➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​
🎮​ We planned to add more Gameplay Features such as
1- Delivery Tasks 🚚​🏍️​
2- Employees 🧑‍🌾​🕵️​👩‍🌾​👷​
3- Real estate business 🏩​🏠​
4- New farming vehicles 🚜​🚛​🛻​
and more......
➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​➖​
